messages.msgSnippet: ***Do you know if every state has a state dinosaur?*** http://www.enchantedlearning.com/subjects/dinosaurs/dinofossils/locations /Statedinos.shtml This looks
messages.messageBody:
***Do you know if every state has a state dinosaur?***

http://www.enchantedlearning.com/subjects/dinosaurs/dinofossils/locations
/Statedinos.shtml

This looks like it lists some state dino's. I didn't read all of it.

***We have many friends living in Bozeman. Do you live near there? ***

I'm in Deer Lodge, about 120 miles north of Bozeman. There are a couple
of lurkers on the Montana Unschoolers list in the Bozeman area I think.

Deb L
